title: Wait so what exactly happened to Athene's etc
body: I just played a poke mid for the first time in ages and after building Athene's I realized it gives much less mana regen now seeming as I ain't played champs that build it in months I never read anything in patch notes regarding this item, can someone explain what they did to it?

replies.body: Simply put they changed Athenes into a defensive item and going Morello is the norm.

> [{quoted}](name=Jakiron,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bqJ7Gckc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-22T19:01:01.890+0000)
>
> They changed it.
> 
> You're welcome.


That's not helpful at all.
Why bother commenting.
What a jackass.

They changed all items with mana regen.

Athene's used to regen 10 mana per 5 seconds.

Now it increases your mana regen by 50%.

This means mana regen items now scale with level.

Majority of champs mana regen starts at 6 at level 1 and end up at 19.6 at level 18.

This means for most champs Athene's will increase mana regen by 3 at level 1 and 9.8 at 18.

A massive nerf early, but a very slight nerf late.

They also buffed the unique passive from 1.5% to 2%.

Does that answer your question.
